comments.author: Matt
comments.body: My toe is letting me know that I should stay off of it today; at least until I see the doctor this afternoon. Enjoy Poorman Loop! I will be doing laps in the pool unfortunately.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Think I found the workout that'll get me through the next 3 months. Bike to Settler's Park, then run the Anemone pipecut up to what I've always called Poorman Hill. Then walk back down to the bike. It's a relatively safe bike ride to Settler's and the pipe cut is super steep... easy on the knees and very aeobic. It's hell being an arthritic bleeder. All I need now is one more malady to make it really challenging... Sheesh. If someone wants to join me sometime, Poorman Hill _is_ really nice.

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Hey, Boys! We arrived today in one piece after blitzing the whole route in one go (no stops). The weather was so severe in KS that we didn't want to camp or even find a motel, so we did the smart thing and tried to outrun the storm. Keep sweatin'! PS: I had looked for that SNL clip before...nice work finding it, Kev. You're hired!
